description:
Non-material amendment pursuant to planning permission Ref: P2013/1667/FUL dated 13 December 2013 for:
1. Proposed Disabled Access Ramp 2. Replacement of Main Entrance Doors
3. Proposed Hotel Signage 4. Replacement of Main Entrance Porch Flooring
5. Relocation of Service Hoist 6. Replacement of Fire Doors 7. Revision to MOE Staircase 8. Proposed Balustrades.
decision_conditions:
